item.title: Michael Manfre about Database backends at Django: Under The Hood 2016
item.description:
Description

Slides: https://speakerdeck.com/manfre/duth-custom-database-backends

Django: Under The Hood: http://djangounderthehood.com/

Django: Under The Hood is an annual Django conference for experienced Django developers. Come and learn about the internals of Django, and help to shape its future.
item.dc:creator: Michael Manfre
